basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Callum Clift. Flutter Developer and Freelancer :) I've been working with Flutter since it's beta days in mid 2018 and have developed multiple applications using a wide variety of packages & plugins including 2 commercial applications for clients avaialble on the App Store & Google Play. I'm very experienced with Flutter and have utilised a wide variety of plugins & packages over the past couple of years to help tailor applications to suit the exact needs of my clients. I'm highly motivated & self driven having built up my skills and expertise alongside working a full time job as a Product Owner for a software development company. I also have experience in developing web applications with Html, CSS, JavaScript & React. Please take a look at some of my projects that I have worked on below and see links to their respective store listings or Github repositories. Thanks for stopping by ðŸ’œ

projects.title: HytechGas
projects.description: My first commericial application working with a client who were looking to transform their tired old paper based processes with a bespoke application to suit their needs. For this application I utilised multiple plugins and packages such as Firebase, Cloud Firestore, Cloud Functions, SQLite, Google Maps & Provider

projects.title: Pegasus Medical 1808
projects.description: Cross platform (Android, iOS & Web) Medical application for completing mental health forms & assessments. Created specifically for a client Pegasus Medical 1808. The application has transformed the way they work moving them away from paper based to digital. For this application I utilised plugins such as Firebase, Cloud Firestore, NoSQL, Push Notifications & Provider

projects.title: Cavetracker
projects.description: Android & iOS application made specifically for caving enthusiasts. Cavetracker allows users to join clubs and share their caving trips and activities with other members. Create & save activity logs without a data connection and send out pre call outs prior to entering caves. Coming soon to App Store & Google Play this application makes use of plugins such as location, geocoding, Google Maps & Cloud Firestore

projects.title: Hytech Solutions Website
projects.description: React JS website built to advertise the HytechGas application for Hytech Solutions Ltd. Technologies used were Html, CSS, JavaScript, React, Cloud Functions.

projects.title: Apeswap Banana Lottery
projects.description: My first blockchain application built using Solidity Smart Contracts and a React front end with Web3 interface. Proof of concept application to allow for owners of the BSC Banana Token to enter a lottery to win Banana Tokens utilising Chainlink VRF (Verifiable Random Function) to generate a secure winner for each round.
